headline: Blackstone nears $4 billion acquisition of MacLean Power Systems, Bloomberg says
summary: Investing.com -- Blackstone Inc. is close to acquiring MacLean Power Systems in a deal that could value the utility-parts maker at more than $4 billion, according to reporting from Bloomberg, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline: Blackstone: I Still Can't Stomach The Valuation
summary: Discover why Blackstone remains a top alternative asset manager, but see why its valuation may be too high for new investors.
